Uses of Interface
ml.alternet.facet.Rewindable

  • Packages that use Rewindable 
    Package Description
    ml.alternet.parser
    Allow to design grammar, parse input and generate a custom data structure.
    ml.alternet.parser.ast
    Helper classes to build an abstract syntax tree thanks to token mappers and rule mappers.
    ml.alternet.parser.handlers
    Various handlers.
    ml.alternet.parser.util
    Data structures utils.
    ml.alternet.scan
    Scan Unicode character streams.

    • Uses of Rewindable in ml.alternet.parser

      Subinterfaces of Rewindable in ml.alternet.parser 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Handler
      Events receiver when a grammar is parsing an input with rewind capabilities (mark, consume/cancel).

    • Uses of Rewindable in ml.alternet.parser.ast

      Subinterfaces of Rewindable in ml.alternet.parser.ast 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Builder<T>
      Build a value from a grammar.
      Classes in ml.alternet.parser.ast that implement Rewindable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NodeBuilder<Node>
      Build an homogeneous AST from a grammar, tokens mapper, and rules mapper.
      class  ValueBuilder<T>
      Build an heterogeneous AST from a grammar, tokens mapper, and rules mapper.

    • Uses of Rewindable in ml.alternet.parser.handlers

      Subinterfaces of Rewindable in ml.alternet.parser.handlers 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DataHandler<T>
      A handler that can supply a data after parsing.
      Classes in ml.alternet.parser.handlers that implement Rewindable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HandlerBuffer
      A rewindable accumulator that can be flushed to a target handler.
      class  TokensCollector<T>
      A handler that collect tokens.
      class  TreeHandler<T,R extends T>
      A tree handler builds a target data structure while parsing with the help of a stack.

    • Uses of Rewindable in ml.alternet.parser.util

    • Uses of Rewindable in ml.alternet.scan

      Classes in ml.alternet.scan that implement Rewindable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ReaderScanner
      A scanner for stream of characters.
      class  Scanner
      A scanner can read Unicode characters from an input stream under conditions.
      class  StringScanner
      A scanner for sequences of chars (i.e. strings).
      class  TrackableScanner
      A scanner that tracks the current line, column, and offset.
